title: Did Prosecutor Alabama tell Ko Klux Klan to kiss my ass?
subtitle: Bill Baxley wrote a famous shortcut to the Great Dragon KKK in 1976 in response to threats to intimidate him.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Former Attorney General Alabama Bill Baxley once said that Ko Klux Klan the Great Dragon "kissing my ass" in response to threats.
